The video was originally posted on Twitt: 2019, and has been viewed approximately 2,800 times.
The video depicts a man: woman, and child running across a badly eroded bridge during a storm, which then collapses, and they appear to fall into the river below. The camera then pans to show a vast expanse of water.
The misleading post on Twitter was capti: OMG It is very very scary #AssamFloods #AssamIsInPain #Assam."
The video has been circulating online si: not Assam. This was verified through a reverse image search and multiple Indian news organization reports from August 2017.
